thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 5 of 147
thread.title: Benjamin Peryer

author: Benjamin Peryer
title: Benjamin Peryer
text: I've ordered from Moo on a number of occasions and the high quality of its products speak for itself. What I'm most impressed by is the customer service. On my most recent order, wedding invitations, I was able to email back and forth with a customer service guy named Ben B. who was kind, responsive, and incredibly helpful in making sure the order was created and delivered PERFECTLY. Hats off to Ben B!
